messages.message:
<!here> hi team, we have a growing number of sandboxes (https://sandbox.console.instabase.com/sandbox). We will start a clean up process starting Tuesday next week. This will allow $$$ savings. In case you'd like to keep a sandbox, please respond in the thread :thread:

cc @Anil @astpierre @Jason
I need to keep PESTer up for LLM proxy testing and two other projects.  It is minimally scaled at least.
Can you clarify how we’ll decide which sandbox is “unused”?
We'd start with sandboxes that were least recently updated. Ideally, we'd like an accept list of sandboxes that we should keep. If there is a sandbox that you'd like to keep, please share it with us.
Nice, this will free up a load of ecr images too that we can purge afterward!

I need to keep these 2 sandboxes -
LANGFUSE - https://sandbox.console.instabase.com/customer/Engineering/tenant/langfuse/info
LANGFUSE-NEW -https://sandbox.console.instabase.com/customer/Engineering/tenant/langfuse-new/info
These sandboxes will always be hibernated, we have langfuse related pods running in the background.
cc - @anshul.padhi @Balaram
@Raul Mächler anything we need to keep from all the Axa sandboxes?
Not from these where we did the pov (germany italy france and belgium)
